name: Larrikin of SPLORR!! ][ - Kordanor's Catacomb
description:
"Hallo! and welcome to this, the next entry in the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 GAME JAM!"

You can play the entire game with the arrow keys, the space bar/enter key and the escape key.

The prolog explains the goal.

My theme implementation is something of a stretch, but I managed to DEW it!
